lyrics.text:
Ko e me’a ia Sīsū,
‘Oku tau kau taha
‘O ma’u ‘a e fiefia,
Mo e nekeneka.

Ko e nekeneka ia,
‘Oku ‘ikai ‘ilo
‘E he kakai fakamaama,
Pea ta’e liliu.

Ko e fiefia ia,
Ta’efa’alaua,
Ko e fua ‘oku tupu,
‘I hotau ‘Otua.

Pea kapau ‘oku pehē,
Hono lelei lahi
‘O ‘etau feohi, mo e
‘Eiki, ‘i lalo ni:

‘E fefē hono lahi fau
‘O e fiefia,
Te tau ‘ilo, ‘i he’etau
Hoko ki ‘olunga?

Pea fakafetaulaki,
Pea kātoa ai
Ki hono taloni lelei,
‘Oku ‘Afio ai.
